page.title: 14INDUSTRY
page.content: THERE ARE NO LARGE INDUSTRIES IN THE BLOCK,THE LARGEST BEING A STONE QUARRY AND A PHOTOGRAPH PROCESSING LABORATORY. OTHER INDUSTRIES INCLUDE FARMING,NURSERIES,A CAR BODY REPAIR GARAGE,A FIRM MAKING OVERALLS FOR INDUSTRY,ANOTHER MAKING PROTECTIVE RUBBER COVERS FOR MACHINERY,(11 MEN EMPLOYED),JOINERY FIRM (10 MEN EMPLOYED),A MINING ENGINEERING FIRM, AND A PRIVATE COAL MINE.THE LATTER, THE DARRAN MINE,DATES FROM THE 12th CENTURY WHEN IT WAS WORKED BY THE MONKS OF NEATH ABBEY.IT NOW EMPLOYES 10 MEN AND HORSES ARE USED TO PULL THE COAL OUT OF THE 1\ MILE DRIFT.
